Esperance.description: A beach known for its stunning white sand and friendly kangaroos.

Esperance.name: Cape Le Grand National Park
Esperance.description: A national park offering spectacular coastal scenery, hiking, and wildlife.

Esperance.name: Esperance Museum
Esperance.description: A museum showcasing local history, including artifacts from the Skylab space station.

Geraldton.description: A memorial commemorating the sailors who lost their lives on HMAS Sydney II.

Geraldton.description: A museum featuring exhibits on the region's maritime history and Aboriginal culture.

Geraldton.name: Geraldton Foreshore
Geraldton.description: A vibrant waterfront area with parks, cafes, and recreational facilities.

Goulburn.name: Big Merino
Goulburn.description: A giant statue of a merino ram, symbolizing the region's wool industry.

Goulburn.name: Belmore Park
Goulburn.description: A central park with gardens, playgrounds, and historical monuments.

Goulburn.name: Rocky Hill War Memorial and Museum
Goulburn.description: A war memorial and museum offering panoramic views and military exhibits.

Griffith.description: A historic cave and lookout with panoramic views over Griffith.

Griffith.name: Griffith Regional Art Gallery
Griffith.description: A gallery featuring contemporary and traditional artworks.
